```{r}
data("mtcars")
transform_function <- function(data) {
  # Returns only the first 10 rows of the dataset
  data[1:10, ]
}
# Running the function of the mtcars dataset
transformed_data <- transform_function(mtcars)
transformed_data
```
```{r}
second_transform_function <- function(data_new) {
  # Creates a new column named row_sum with the sum of each row's numeric values
  data_new$row_sum <- rowSums(data_new[sapply(data_new, is.numeric)])
  return(data_new)
}
#Apply function to mtcars dataset
transformed_data <- second_transform_function(mtcars)
transformed_data
```
